name: leasehub-monorepo
description: LeaseHub - Property Management System (Tenant Portal + Admin Console)

scripts.setup: npm install && cd tenant-app && npm install && cd ../admin-app && npm install
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run start:tenant" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.build: echo 'No build step needed for Node.js' && exit 0
scripts.prod:start: NODE_ENV=production node -e "require('dotenv').config(); require('concurrently')(['npm run start:tenant', 'npm run start:admin']).then(success => process.exit(success ? 0 : 1))"
scripts.check:env: node -e "const env = require('./.env'); console.log('Environment Check:'); ['NODE_ENV', 'STRIPE_SECRET_KEY', 'SESSION_SECRET', 'MONGO_URI', 'TENANT_URL', 'ADMIN_URL'].forEach(k => console.log(`  ${k}: ${process.env[k] ? 'SET' : 'MISSING'}`))"
